title: Diamond Bloom Bracelet - Vajra Kankanam
materials: G Color). Features a high Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: This contemporary 'Kankanam' style bracelet showcases a stylized floral motif at its center, flanked by geometric square designs. The floral designs are crafted with meticulously set pave diamonds in a floral style, and the squares boast channel set diamonds. The bracelet's construction offers a comfortable yet secure fit.
colors: Rose gold with shimmering white diamonds
creating a warm and luxurious aesthetic.
occasions: or as a sophisticated touch to your everyday ensemble. Also suitable as a modern piece for pre-wedding celebrations like Sangeet.
description: This diamond bracelet is a testament to modern elegance and timeless appeal. The flower-shaped design and high-quality craftsmanship offer a luxurious feel. The high-polish finish ensures years of brilliance. Wear a piece of modern beauty and craftsmanship.
